topic.title: How do you associate your site/blog with a registered .bit?
Does zeronet conflicts with .bit chrome extension proxy?
topic.body: Once I installed .bit proxy extension on chrome it seemed to have broken zeronet...

1_15zfQw1PPLNRYGUtuzTj1LN5hX6K24rUnY.body: I installed NMC-QT yesterday and this morning I got the whole blockchain downloaded which allowed me to register the domain using a few coins I got while merge-mining BTC. It's *alot* cheaper to do it this way. but I'm not sure how to proceed now, in associating the domain with my site.
